text:
Hey Shailendra! 
Thats for your response thats very insightful
 I find planning and balance almost crucial as I do Olympic lifting in my free time! So its all about finding balance and scheduling. 

The show looks visually stunning. Some very beautiful comp work and colour storys, must give it a watch when I get the chance. 

Ive got some exciting updates. So after my freelance period in Lexhag I have been contacted with a suggestion for a job offer in may time when I graduate in production as a coordinator!! 

They said that they were very impressed and that It seemed like I was there for a long time prior and sloted right into the team! 

Great to have options open. I feel very chuffed, nice to know that hard work is recognised! 

I'm also going to FMX this march booked my flights today. So all very busy but very exciting! 

What was your forst industry job? 
Hope you are well!
